title: The Mansion [game trailer]
abstract: It's a moonless night...let's go explore a mansion... 'Screen It' 2013 Winner - Secondary Videogames.
description: It's a moonless night... Let's go explore a mansion. In 'The Mansion', a nameless character finds himself with the task of searching an old mansion. Although he can't understand the lost children it doesn't take a true connection to know only he can help. The story is told through a platformer format, inspired by games such as Super Mario Bros.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2002926; 'Screen It' 2013 [winning entries]; Active; 2013
